-ccaqruH kAqryO$&sminnEqva lOqka Ru#ddhnOtyAdiqtyO Ba#vatIq yaM ~MvA adi#tiraqsyAmEqva prati# tiShThaqtyathO# aqsyAmEqvAdhi# yaqj~jaM ta#nutEq yO vai sa#M~MvathsaqramuKyaq-maBRu#tvAq&gniM ci#nuqtE yathA# sAqmi garBO#&vaqpadya#tE tAqdRugEqva tadArtiqmArcCE$d-vaiSvAnaqraM dvAda#SakapAlaM puqrastAqnnirva#pEth saM~MvathsaqrO 
vA aqgnirvai$SvAnaqrO yathA# saMvathsaqramAqptvA - [  ] 6
